input.sentences: we brought my father 's remains to the crematorium today .
the cemetery was full of tombstones .
it had many large headstones too .
it was behind our local church .
we got my father an angel statue .
output.sentences: The local cemeteries have a long and storied history.
The high water table has forced cemeteries to keep burials above ground.
Along with the many historic and dramatic statues and memorials, this gives the cemeteries and ambiance that stimulates the imagination.
The modern chapels are bright and welcoming.
But, for those with a gothic sensibility, it is not enough to temper the imagination.
